page.title: 06KNIVETON POST OFFICE
page.content: Kniveton is a small village with only one shop and that is the Post Office.It is situated in the lower part of the village in an old detached house called the Old Hall. The shop is in one of the rooms.A new saftey screen and counter have just been fitted in the last few weeks. The main buisness is the Post Office but various other things are sold such as food (mainly in tins and packets), sweets, chocolate,cigarettes,minerals, and a few groceries. The shop is open from 9am until 1pm and then from 4pm to 5.30pm.Half days closing are on Thursday and Saturday. The busiest days are Pension days. Most of the customers are local village people,which isn't surprising because from the main road it is difficult to tell that the Post Office is there.
